BEFORE THE NATIONAL ADJUDICATORY COUNCIL NASD In the Matter of Department of Enforcement, Complainant, vs. John M. Meyers Coram, NY and  Brian C. Klein Farmingdale, NY, Respondent. Respondents engaged in fraud by recklessly failing to disclose sales incentives to customers and by recklessly making baseless price predictions to customers. Held. Hearing Panel's findings affirmed and sanctions modified. Appearances
